title: Add a favicon file to the frontend

requirements.text: Add favicon static asset(s) to the frontend and reference them from the HTML entry point so browsers display the site icon.
acceptanceCriteria: A favicon file exists under frontend/public (for example: frontend/public/favicon.svg and/or frontend/public/favicon.ico).
frontend/index.html includes appropriate <link rel="icon" ...> tag(s) referencing the new favicon file(s).
When running the app in a browser, the tab icon shows the new favicon (no missing favicon 404 in devtools network panel).

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui or any frontend immutablePaths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Treat favicon assets as static files served from frontend/public (do not route image bytes through the backend).
nonGoals: Implementing PWA manifest, apple-touch-icon, or full cross-platform icon set unless explicitly requested.

required: Simple flat monogram logo with the letters "ML" in a circular badge, charcoal and orange, centered (favicon-ml-badge.dim_512x512.png)
